txt.en: 'Well done, my friend. May this be the last we see of these foul sorceries.'
Find the source of the corruption
The source of the crystals' corruption has been located, but what lies in wait in the muck?
The source of the crystals' corruption has been located, but what lies in wait in the muck?

'The torn page pieces have helped me make sense of some of the ramblings. The fragments turned out to be a map, leading to the origin of the crystals! Look here! See those lines? Those are dragon bones, or I'm beard lice. Obviously I will be joining you in order to study and recover what I may.\n\n'I have pieced the fragments together for you on the table, and we have the candle. Speak with me when you are ready to go. Oh, and you may wish to bring along some friends with you. Who knows what truly waits in the crystal cavern.'
Mother Amma is in north-eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Mother Amma that the threat has been defeated.
